name: KeyboardCode

global_functions.description:
Convert a key code to string, using the values of `KeyboardEvent.key`,
a list of available keys can be found at:
[Key Values - MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/KeyboardEvent/key/Key_Values).

There is an exception that the <kbd>Space Bar</kbd> is represented as
`"Space"` in Yue instead of `" "`.

signature.name: KeyboardCodeFromStr

parameters.name: shifted
parameters.description: Whether the represented key requires <kbd>Shift</kbd> to be pressed.

signature.str: KeyboardCode KeyboardCodeFromStr(const std::string& str, bool* shifted)

global_functions.description: Convert a string to a KeyboardCode.

detail:
`KeyboardCode` is an `enum` with following values, the actual integer values
are different on different platforms:

* `VKEY_CANCEL`
* `VKEY_BACK`
* `VKEY_TAB`
* `VKEY_CLEAR`
* `VKEY_RETURN`
* `VKEY_SHIFT`
* `VKEY_CONTROL`
* `VKEY_MENU`
* `VKEY_PAUSE`
* `VKEY_CAPITAL`
* `VKEY_KANA`
* `VKEY_HANGUL`
* `VKEY_HANJA`
* `VKEY_KANJI`
* `VKEY_ESCAPE`
